ygData.subject: RE: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If I stand there for a few seconds they do, like you said. They do not simply ignore me.  The post earlier made it seem like you could stroll in and never
ygData.messageBody:
> You're saying these things all attack you the moment they see
> you?

If I stand there for a few seconds they do, like you said.
They do not simply ignore me. The post earlier made it seem
like you could stroll in and never be attacked by the little
goblins. Any goblin starting with the word fire or inferno
takes about a second or two to trigger, and all the others
will still attack me regardless of anything. It may take
a few seconds but they still attack me, most definitely.

Some are easier to piss off than others, I suppose.

But you'll never be able to stroll through this place like
you can in Blackburrow for example.

Harmonic.
